message.content:
cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.OH, cs.CE, cs.RO

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper presents a model predictive control scheme for linear, discrete, time-invariant systems, which falls under the scope of systems and control.
- cs.DS (Dynamical Systems): The paper deals with the control of dynamical systems, specifically linear systems, and presents a reduced order model approach to address the computational complexity of high-dimensional systems.
- cs.OH (Optimization and Control): The paper presents an optimization-based approach to designing the MPC cost function and solving linear programs for robust constraint satisfaction, which falls under the scope of optimization and control.
- cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science): The paper presents a case study on a high-dimensional linear model of a flexible rod obtained using finite element methods, which falls under the scope of computational engineering.
- cs.RO (Robotics): Although the paper does not explicitly mention robotics, the presented approach can be applied to control robotic systems, which falls under the scope of robotics.
